name: 46th IOP Plasma Physics Conference, Loughborough, UK
content: The annual IOP Plasma Physics Conference covers all aspects of plasma physics, including Magnetic and Inertial confinement fusion, Astrophysical and Space Plasmas, Low Density and Technological/Industrial Plasmas, Low Temperature Plasmas, High Energy Density and Laser Plasmas, Dusty and Complex plasmas, Plasma Surface interactions, Plasma Applications including Medical applications and Plasma Diagnostics. This year, the conference will be collocated with the 3rd UK Pulsed Power Symposium. Time: 11:00 am to 12:40 pm Venue Details: Holywell Park Conference Centre, Loughborough University Science and Enterprise Park (LUSEP) Holywell Way, Leicestershire, Loughborough, LE11 3GR, United Kingdom
